settings.text: A beautiful boxed set containing all seven Harry Potter novels in paperback. These new editions of the classic and internationally bestselling, multi-award-winning series feature instantly pick-up-able new jackets by Jonny Duddle, with huge child appeal, to bring Harry Potter to the next generation of readers. It's time to PASS THE MAGIC ON …

settings.title: Come-to-Life Augmented Reality Books
settings.text: Little Hippo® Books uses augmented reality (AR) technology to enhance reading. With our free, downloadable app and the Little Hippo Books made with AR, we create an immersive, interactive reading experience.

settings.quote_text: Get the Hippo Magic® App! The free Hippo Magic App is available on Apple or Android devices. Download it to start your reading adventure using any of the Little Hippo® Books with a Hippo Magic symbol.

6-in-1 Puzzle Bible. Creation. The 6-in-1 Puzzle Bible offers a unique possibility to introduce children to 6 well-know stories from the Gospels, piece by piece, puzzle by puzzle. And in the end, see the Life of Jesus in just one glimpse!
Join the cheeky baby chick as he meets lots of new Farm Friends in this beautifully illustrated, double-sided jigsaw book.

This deligtful jigsaw book has been created as the perfect introduction to puzzles - and animals - for your child. With colourful illustrations, charming text and robust press-out jigsaws, it will inspire young minds and little hands.

Film Projection: These enchanting books allow fans to project their favourite scenes from the Harry Potter and Fantastic Beasts films at home!
Scratch and Sparkle: Come and explore! These books are packed with exciting activities to complete!
Sticker Play Disney: Enjoy the wonderful world of the Disney with these amazing sticker and activity books.

555 Mixed: Complete exciting scenes with more than 500 easy-to-peel stickers. There are Sticker Fun books on Holidays, Animals, the Sea and the Farm.

settings.homepage_free_shipping_success_text: Congrats, You Are Entitled for Free Shipping!

settings.recommended-heading: Don't Know What to Buy? Let Us Help you!
settings.recommended-subHeading: There’s always a book for everyone! Let us give you an idea on how to find the right book to make reading fun!

settings.general_questions_question: When is the Big Bad Wolf Online Book Sale?
settings.general_questions_answer: The Big Bad Wolf Online Book Sale will begin on 29th July 2021 at midnight and end on 2nd August 2021 at 11:59 PM.
From the date of your purchase, delivery will take approximately 21 to 30 business days.

Reasonable delivery charges will automatically be computed at the checkout page before you complete your order. Charges are based on local delivery rates only. There are no additional taxes or customs charges.

settings.general_questions_question: Am I eligible for Free Shipping?
settings.general_questions_answer: FREE SHIPPING is applicable with a minimum nett spend of P2,900 and above in a single order.

settings.general_questions_question: How can I track my order?
settings.general_questions_answer:
Once you have placed your order, you will receive the following email notifications confirming the status of your order.

1. Order Confirmation – Order Number Provided (Once Order is Captured)
2. Payment Confirmation – Invoice Provided (Payment Captured)
3. Shipping Confirmation – Tracking number Provided (Ready to be Shipped)
4. Order Left Malaysia - Order has left our packing facility (Delivery on the way)
5. Order Has Arrived – Order arrived in the Philippines (Delivery will be Scheduled Soon)

You may also track your order by logging into your account and checking from the “Orders” section.

settings.general_questions_question: What should I do if I have accidentally purchased duplicate items?
settings.general_questions_answer: It is not possible to amend or cancel items. The Big Bad Wolf Online Book Sale is only of short duration, orders are processed and packed as quickly and efficiently as possible. Hence, please be sure to check through your cart carefully before making payment.

settings.general_questions_question: What do I do if I have made a duplicate order by mistake?
settings.general_questions_answer: Cancellation of an order is not possible once it has been processed. Please be sure to check your email (inbox/junk/spam) to ensure you have not missed an order invoice before you proceed to make a new order. Should you still be unsure, you may email us at supportph@bigbadwolfbooks.com.

If the status of your order indicates as “Pending”, it means that payment was not made or captured. To verify if your order was successful, we would recommend to check your email (inbox/junk/spam) to see if you have received an invoice.

settings.general_questions_question: I used my discount code when trying to checkout, but wasn’t able to complete payment. When I try to reorder, I’m unable to re-use my discount code. What do I do?
settings.general_questions_answer:
Please do email us at supportph@bigbadwolfbooks.com with details below and we will be happy to assist you:

1. Your registered e-mail address with BBW Online

2. The discount code that you have been trying to use.

settings.general_questions_question: How do I know if my purchase or payment was successful?
settings.general_questions_answer: Log in to your account and click on “My Order” to check on the status of your order. Alternatively, you may check your email (inbox/junk/spam) to view your order invoice. In the event you have not received the invoice or are unable to check on the status of your order, please do not hesitate to email us at supportph@bigbadwolfbooks.com.

settings.general_questions_question: How do I search for a book?
settings.general_questions_answer:
We have a huge selection of books and other items spanning a wide variety of categories and genres. To make it easy for you to browse, there are two ways to navigate:

Search Field:

Enter a book title, author, keyword or ISBN into the Search field found at the top of our webpage and then press the magnifying glass icon.

Categories:

An extensive list of categories and sub-categories can be found at the top of the webpage, with drop-down menus. Just move the mouse pointer and click on the categories or sub-categories.

settings.general_questions_question: I can’t find the book that I want. Can I place a special order?
settings.general_questions_answer:
Unfortunately, that isn’t possible as the Big Bad Wolf
Online Book Sale does not take special orders at the moment.

settings.general_questions_question: I have selected my books and added them to my cart but I’m unable to checkout. Why is that?
settings.general_questions_answer: The most likely reason is that there are books in your cart that are “Out of Stock”. Please remove the out of stock books and then proceed to “Checkout”.

settings.general_questions_question: I contacted your support team via email a few hours ago. Why haven’t I received a reply?
settings.general_questions_answer: We sincerely apologize for the delay in our response, we aim to respond to enquiries within 24 hours.

settings.membership_question: How do I register for an account?
settings.membership_answer: To register, simply click on the following link " https://my.bbwbooks.com/account/register ".It will lead to the registration page for you to fill in the required details. For assistance, please email us at supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com

settings.membership_question: What do I enjoy as a member?
settings.membership_answer: You will be entitled to ongoing attractive discounts and promotions.

settings.membership_question: I have forgotten my password, what should I do?
settings.membership_answer: To reset your password, click on the following link "https://my.bbwbooks.com/account/login?return_url=%2Faccount# and fill in your email address. An email will be sent to guide you on how to reset your password.

settings.membership_question: How do I change the information in my account?
settings.membership_answer: To change the information in your account, you will need to Log In to your account and click on Profile. You will then be able to view and edit your information from your profile page.

settings.orders_question: How do I place an order?
settings.orders_answer:
For a quick checkout experience, please ensure that you are logged in before placing an order. Once logged in:

Step 1: Select the Book of your choice

Step 2: Click on the ‘Add to Cart’ icon

Step 3: Click the Shopping Cart Icon

Step 4: Confirm the details of the item(s) you have ordered

Step 5: Key in your user ID and Password.

 

a)  Shipping Address

b)  Shipping Method

c)  Payment Method

d)   Proceed to ‘Checkout’

settings.orders_question: Can I add items into an existing order?
settings.orders_answer: You may continue to shop and add as many items as you wish to your order, as long as you have not proceeded to Checkout and made payment. Unfortunately, we are unable to combine orders or add items to an order once it has been paid for.

settings.orders_question: How will I know if you have received my order?
settings.orders_answer: Upon receiving your order, we will send you a notification email. In the unlikely event that we are unable to fulfil your order for any reason, we will notify you and process a refund for you.

settings.orders_question: What happens if I leave my orders in the cart unpaid?
settings.orders_answer: We suggest that you complete your purchase as soon as you have placed your items in your cart as all items are available only “While Stocks last”. We are unable to guarantee that your chosen items will still be available later.

settings.orders_question: I am unable to add an item to my cart. What should I do?
settings.orders_answer: Please try refreshing your browser and clearing your cookies and cache. If the problem persists, please email a screenshot to supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com so that we may assist you further.

settings.orders_question: Will I receive any order confirmation after placing an order?
settings.orders_answer:
Yes, notification emails will be sent to you confirming the status of your order once you have placed it. The emails that you will receive are:

1. Order Confirmation – Order Number Provided (Once Order is Captured)
2. Payment Confirmation – Invoice Provided (Payment Captured)
3. Shipping Confirmation – Tracking number Provided (Ready to be Shipped)

settings.orders_question: Can I change my delivery address after my order has been dispatched?
settings.orders_answer: As our online store is set up to process your orders quickly and efficiently, we regret that your delivery address cannot be changed. Please be sure to enter a complete address upon your checkout.

settings.orders_question: What do I do if I have made duplicate orders by mistake?
settings.orders_answer:
Cancellation of an order is not possible once it has been processed. Please be sure to check
your email (inbox/junk/spam) to ensure you have not missed an order invoice before you proceed to make a new order. Should you still be unsure, you may email us at supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com.

If the status of your order indicates as “Pending”, it means that payment was not received. To verify if your order was successful, we would recommend checking your email (inbox/junk/spam) to see if you have received an invoice. If you have not received it, please email is at supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com.

settings.payment_question: How do I know if my payment was successful?
settings.payment_answer: Log in to your account and click on “My Order”, your order status will show “Paid”. Alternatively, you may check your email (inbox/spam) to view your order invoice from the Payment Confirmation Email. In the event you have not received the invoice or are unable to check on the status of your order, please do not hesitate to email us at supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com.

settings.payment_question: What are forms of online payment that you accept?
settings.payment_answer:
The modes of online payment that we accept are:

- Debit and Credit Cards VISA and MasterCard

- FPX Online Banking

- E-Wallets

- Boost, MCash, Touch 'N Go, GrabPay and Maybank QR

settings.shipping_answer:
Reasonable delivery charges will automatically be calculated at the checkout page before you
complete your order. Charges are based on local delivery rates only. There are no additional taxes or
customs charges.

settings.shipping_question: Am I eligible for Free Shipping?
settings.shipping_answer:
FREE SHIPPING is applicable for Peninsular Malaysia with a
minimum nett spend of MYR 150
and above in a single order.

For deliveries to Peninsular Malaysia, the delivery will take approximately 5 to 8 business days from the date payment is received.


For deliveries to East Malaysia, the delivery will take approximately 10 to 15 business days from the date payment is received.

settings.shipping_question: How do I track my shipment?
settings.shipping_answer:
We will email the tracking number that will enable you to check the status of your order on the respective courier company's website.

DHL: https://ecommerceportal.dhl.com/track/?locale=en


Hock Cheong: Hock Cheong: http://hoch-tracking.herokuapp.com/

settings.shipping_question: Are you able to deliver my orders on weekends or Public Holidays?
settings.shipping_answer:
Unfortunately, our courier partner company only schedules deliveries on weekdays, from Mondays
to Fridays with no delivery on Public Holidays.

settings.shipping_question: I haven’t received my order, what should I do?
settings.shipping_answer: In the unlikely event that you do not receive your order within the specified delivery period, please check with the relevant courier company or by contacting us at supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com with the details.

settings.shipping_question: What will happen to my parcel if it is undelivered or unclaimed?
settings.shipping_answer: Please contact the relevant courier company and provide your tracking number for them to investigate and revert to you accordingly. If you have questions, you may refer to our Shipping Policy (https://my.bbwbooks.com/pages/cancelation-refund-policy). Please do not hesitate to email us at supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com.

settings.damaged_items_question: I received a damaged item. What should I do?
settings.damaged_items_answer:
Please notify us via email at supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com and include the following information. Once all the relevant information is gathered, we will investigate and keep you advised accordingly of the resolution.

1) Order Number
2) Photos of the damaged item(s)

settings.refunds_answer: To offer you the best prices at our Big Bad Wolf Online Book Sale, we strictly impose a non-cancellation and non-refund policy on all items sold.

settings.cancellation_question: How do I cancel my order?
settings.cancellation_answer:
We are unable to cancel, combine or add items to an order once it has been placed. To avoid this predicament, we encourage you to spend as much time as you want shopping, deciding and checking the order before proceeding to Checkout to make payment.

For further assistance, please email us at supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com.

settings.technical_issues_question: If I encounter an error at ‘Add to Cart’, Checkout, Payment or etc., what do I do?
settings.technical_issues_answer: If you encounter any of these issues, please try refreshing your browser, clearing cookies and cache. If the problem still persists, please email us at supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com. Please include a screenshot of the error in your email for us to be able to assist you further.

settings.technical_issues_question: I used my promotion/discount code when trying to checkout, but wasn’t able to complete the transaction. When I try to reorder, I’m unable to re-use my discount code. What do I do?
settings.technical_issues_answer:
Please do email us at
supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com with the details below and we will be look into this:

1. Your registered e-mail address with BBW Online

2. The discount code that you have been trying to use.

settings.technical_issues_question: I am having issues when trying to an make an order/payment. What do I do?
settings.technical_issues_answer:
Please clear your cache and cookies and try again. Should this issue persist, please do not hesitate to email us at supportmy@bigbadwolfbooks.com. Please include the details below so that we can assist you efficiently.

1. Screenshots/Images of the issue or error.

2. The browser that you are using, i.e. Chrome, Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, etc.

3. The device that you are using, i.e. IOS or Android.

settings.promotions_question: FREE SHIPPING WITHIN WEST MALAYSIA (EXCLUDING EAST MALAYSIA)
settings.promotions_answer:
● Free shipping with minimum nett spend of RM150.
● This offer is only applicable for orders and deliveries within West Malaysia excluding East Malaysia.
● No promo code is required. Free shipping will be automatically applied at
checkout when a customer makes a net spend of RM150 and above.
● Nett spend is calculated after all the sales discounts and promotions have been subtracted from the gross sales amount.
● Once the parcel is shipped out from our warehouse, delivery will take between 3 to 5 business days.
● Promotion is only valid during the BBW Malaysia Baby Wolf Online Book Sale from 29th July - 2nd August 2021.
● Big Bad Wolf Books Sdn. Bhd. reserves the right to change the terms and conditions at any time without further notice.
